bike.description: Triple-butted 6061 aluminum main tubes, 1.5 - 1 1/8" tapered head tube, sloping radius top tube, over-sized seat tube, replaceable derailleur hanger

components.description: Rock Shox XC32 TK, Solo Air spring, external rebound, TurnKey lockout adjust, 32mm stanchions, aluminum steerer, 100mm travel
FSA Orbit 1.5 Zero-Stack internal cup, for tapered head tube, 30mm shim stack
WTB Speed Disc i19 29" double-wall eyeleted disc-specific rims, Formula Hi-Lo flange sealed bearing 6-bolt disc hubs, 14g stainless steel spokes
SRAM X7 rear and X7 front
Avid DB1 hydraulic with G2CS 180mm (front) & 160mm (rear) rotors
Ritchey Comp 2x bar, 31.8 x 9JAMIS_DEGREE sweep x +/- 5mm rise x 720mm
Ritchey 2-bolt OS, 31.6 x 400mm, with alloy clamp
